materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a valley in Chumba, Punjab. There are several levelled hill-tops in the valley, with narrow paths snaking through. In the foreground of the photograph, there is a man on a small path. He is wearing a white headpiece and black attire, holding a walking stick in his right hand. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Chumba, Punjab
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Punjab (India) Valleys Mountains
